enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve loan and collateral operations, making flexibleLoanBorrow a suitable setup for flexibleLoanRepay.
flexibleLoanOngoingOrders can provide the ongoing loan orders that need to be repaid, making it a relevant setup for flexibleLoanRepay.
flexibleLoanRepayHistory can be used to verify the repayment history after executing flexibleLoanRepay, ensuring the state is as expected.
flexibleLoanAdjustLtv might need to be invoked after flexibleLoanRepay to adjust the loan-to-value ratio, ensuring the collateral state is updated.
